author: @anilmurmu6675
text: Key takeaway is : if Entropy is closer to 1 or equal to 1 then it is more impure. if Entropy is 0 then it is considered to be leaf node or it is a pure split. Decision tree classification model will be chosen based on Information Gain with highest value.
